```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
assets_2007 <- read.csv("Desktop/cr-data/statnipokladna/lt_tangible_assets_2007_2009.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
assets_2010 <- read.csv("Desktop/cr-data/statnipokladna/lt_tangible_assets_10_20.csv", colClasses = c("year"="character"))
```

```{r}
assets_2007$year <- as.Date(paste(assets_2007$year, "/01", sep=""), format="%Y/%m/%d")
assets_2007$year<- format(assets_2007$year, "%Y")
```

```{r}
assets_2007 <- assets_2007[,c(2,1,3)]
assets_2010 <- assets_2010%>%rename("lt_tangible_assets_CZK"="lg_tangible_assets_CZK")
merged <- rbind(assets_2007, assets_2010)
merged$year <- sapply(merged$year, as.numeric)
```

```{r}
write.csv(merged, "tangible_assets_2007_2020.csv")
```
